item.title: “Model this.”
item.description:
Sam Koppelman on Twitter

“As I’ve been trying to process the SBF news... ...I keep thinking back to this interview he did with @tylercowen—where he, essentially, said he’d risk THE ENTIRE PLANET for a 51% shot at a second planet. This man ended up St. Petersburg paradoxing himself into his own grave.”

URL: https://twitter.com/SammyKoppelman/status/1590476845241114624

item.title: CZ 🔶 Binance on Twitter
item.description:
CZ 🔶 Binance on Twitter

“As part of Binance’s exit from FTX equity last year, Binance received roughly $2.1 billion USD equivalent in cash (BUSD and FTT). Due to recent revelations that have came to light, we have decided to liquidate any remaining FTT on our books. 1/4”

URL: https://twitter.com/cz_binance/status/1589283421704290306

source: The Old Story: The Fall of Sam Bankman-Fried, &

item.title: Liz Hoffman on Twitter
item.description:
Liz Hoffman on Twitter

“This a.m. before securing an emergency lifeline from rival Binance, FTX was canvassing deep pockets in Silicon Valley and Wall St — think billionaires, not institutions — ppl familiar told me & @lmatsakis @SaacksAttack. Two of the ppl he he was seeking more than $1bn.”

URL: https://twitter.com/lizrhoffman/status/1590021299295768578

source: The Old Story: The Fall of Sam Bankman-Fried, &

item.title: CZ 🔶 Binance on Twitter
item.description:
CZ 🔶 Binance on Twitter

“This afternoon, FTX asked for our help. There is a significant liquidity crunch. To protect users, we signed a non-binding LOI, intending to fully acquire https://t.co/BGtFlCmLXB and help cover the liquidity crunch. We will be conducting a full DD in the coming days.”

URL: https://twitter.com/cz_binance/status/1590013613586411520

source: The Old Story: The Fall of Sam Bankman-Fried, &

item.title: CZ 🔶 Binance on Twitter
item.description:
CZ 🔶 Binance on Twitter

“Two big lessons: 1: Never use a token you created as collateral. 2: Don’t borrow if you run a crypto business. Don’t use capital “efficiently”. Have a large reserve. Binance has never used BNB for collateral, and we have never taken on debt. Stay #SAFU.🙏”

URL: https://twitter.com/cz_binance/status/1590103159506341888

source: The Old Story: The Fall of Sam Bankman-Fried, &
